titles: Die Jovis, 8 Novembr. 1649. Two orders of Parliament the one, referring to the Councel of State, to give ten pounds to every one who shall bring in a high-way-man; the other, referring to the said Councel to give reprieves to persons guilty of robberies, if they shall discover any of their accomplices.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed by John Field for Edward Husband, Printer to the Parliament of England,
notes: A variant of the edition lacking caption title (Wing E2269).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1649-1660 --  Early works to 1800.
